root.name: # (comment)

example.code: # Draws two lines which divides the window # into four quadrants line(0, 50, 100, 50) # Draw the horizontal line line(50, 0, 50, 100) # Draw the vertical line

root.description: Explanatory notes embedded within the code. Comments are used to remind yourself and to inform others about the details of the code. Single-line comments are signified with the pound sign. Comments are ignored by the interpreter.
